documentation: Amazon Inspector is a vulnerability discovery service that automates continuous scanning for security vulnerabilities within your Amazon EC2 and Amazon ECR environments.

AssociateMember.documentation: Associates an Amazon Web Services account with an Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.
AssociateMember.name: AssociateMember

BatchGetAccountStatus.documentation: Retrieves the Amazon Inspector status of multiple Amazon Web Services accounts within your environment.
BatchGetAccountStatus.name: BatchGetAccountStatus

BatchGetFreeTrialInfo.documentation: Gets free trial status for multiple Amazon Web Services accounts.
BatchGetFreeTrialInfo.name: BatchGetFreeTrialInfo

CreateFilter.documentation: Creates a filter resource using specified filter criteria.
CreateFilter.name: CreateFilter

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.documentation: Describe Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an Amazon Web Services organization
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration

Disable.documentation: Disables Amazon Inspector scans for one or more Amazon Web Services accounts. Disabling all scan types in an account disables the Amazon Inspector service.
Disable.name: Disable

DisableDelegatedAdminAccount.documentation: Disables the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.
DisableDelegatedAdminAccount.name: DisableDelegatedAdminAccount

DisassociateMember.documentation: Disassociates a member account from an Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.
DisassociateMember.name: DisassociateMember

Enable.documentation: Enables Amazon Inspector scans for one or more Amazon Web Services accounts.
Enable.name: Enable

EnableDelegatedAdminAccount.documentation: Enables the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your Organizations organization.
EnableDelegatedAdminAccount.name: EnableDelegatedAdminAccount

GetDelegatedAdminAccount.documentation: Retrieves information about the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.
GetDelegatedAdminAccount.name: GetDelegatedAdminAccount

GetFindingsReportStatus.documentation: Gets the status of a findings report.
GetFindingsReportStatus.name: GetFindingsReportStatus

ListAccountPermissions.documentation: Lists the permissions an account has to configure Amazon Inspector.
ListAccountPermissions.name: ListAccountPermissions

ListCoverageStatistics.documentation: Lists Amazon Inspector coverage statistics for your environment.
ListCoverageStatistics.name: ListCoverageStatistics

ListDelegatedAdminAccounts.documentation: Lists information about the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator of your organization.
ListDelegatedAdminAccounts.name: ListDelegatedAdminAccounts

ListFilters.documentation: Lists the filters associated with your account.
ListFilters.name: ListFilters

ListFindingAggregations.documentation: Lists aggregated finding data for your environment based on specific criteria.
ListFindingAggregations.name: ListFindingAggregations

ListMembers.documentation: List members associated with the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.
ListMembers.name: ListMembers

ListTagsForResource.documentation: Lists all tags attached to a given resource.
ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource

ListUsageTotals.documentation: Lists the Amazon Inspector usage totals over the last 30 days.
ListUsageTotals.name: ListUsageTotals

UpdateConfiguration.documentation: Updates setting configurations for your Amazon Inspector account. When you use this API as an Amazon Inspector delegated administrator this updates the setting for all accounts you manage. Member accounts in an organization cannot update this setting.
UpdateConfiguration.name: UpdateConfiguration

UpdateFilter.documentation: Specifies the action that is to be applied to the findings that match the filter.
UpdateFilter.name: UpdateFilter

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.documentation: Updates the configurations for your Amazon Inspector organization.
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration

AccessDeniedException.documentation: You do not have sufficient access to perform this action.

Account.documentation: An Amazon Web Services account within your environment that Amazon Inspector has been enabled for.

accountId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

resourceStatus.documentation: Details of the status of Amazon Inspector scans by resource type.

status.documentation: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

AccountAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon Web Services accounts.

AccountAggregationResponse.documentation: An aggregation of findings by Amazon Web Services account ID.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

AccountState.documentation: An object with details the status of an Amazon Web Services account within your Amazon Inspector environment

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

resourceState.documentation: An object detailing which resources Amazon Inspector is enabled to scan for the account.

state.documentation: An object detailing the status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

accountAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon Web Services account IDs.

amiAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon Machine Images (AMIs).

awsEcrContainerAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon ECR container images.

ec2InstanceAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon EC2 instances.

findingTypeAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on finding types.

imageLayerAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on container image layers.

packageAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on operating system package type.

repositoryAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on Amazon ECR repositories.

titleAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation request based on finding title.

AggregationResponse.documentation: A structure that contains details about the results of an aggregation type.

accountAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon Web Services account IDs.

amiAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon Machine Images (AMIs).

awsEcrContainerAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon ECR container images.

ec2InstanceAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon EC2 instances.

findingTypeAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on finding types.

imageLayerAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on container image layers.

packageAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on operating system package type.

repositoryAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on Amazon ECR repositories.

titleAggregation.documentation: An object that contains details about an aggregation response based on finding title.

AmiAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on Amazon machine images (AMIs).

amis.documentation: The IDs of AMIs to aggregate findings for.

AmiAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains the results of a finding aggregation by AMI.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID that the AMI belongs.

affectedInstances.documentation: The IDs of Amazon EC2 instances using this AMI.

ami.documentation: The ID of the AMI that findings were aggregated for.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that contains the count of matched findings per severity.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the member account to be associated.
The Amazon Web Services account ID of the successfully associated member account.

AutoEnable.documentation: Represents which scan types are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

ec2.documentation: Represents whether Amazon EC2 scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

ecr.documentation: Represents whether Amazon ECR scans are automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

AwsEc2InstanceDetails.documentation: Details of the Amazon EC2 instance involved in a finding.

iamInstanceProfileArn.documentation: The IAM instance profile ARN of the Amazon EC2 instance.

imageId.documentation: The image ID of the Amazon EC2 instance.

ipV4Addresses.documentation: The IPv4 addresses of the Amazon EC2 instance.

ipV6Addresses.documentation: The IPv6 addresses of the Amazon EC2 instance.

keyName.documentation: The name of the key pair used to launch the Amazon EC2 instance.

launchedAt.documentation: The date and time the Amazon EC2 instance was launched at.

platform.documentation: The platform of the Amazon EC2 instance.

subnetId.documentation: The subnet ID of the Amazon EC2 instance.

type.documentation: The type of the Amazon EC2 instance.

vpcId.documentation: The VPC ID of the Amazon EC2 instance.

AwsEcrContainerAggregation.documentation: An aggregation of information about Amazon ECR containers.

AwsEcrContainerAggregationResponse.documentation: An aggregation of information about Amazon ECR containers.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account that owns the container.

imageSha.documentation: The SHA value of the container image.

AwsEcrContainerImageDetails.documentation: The image details of the Amazon ECR container image.

architecture.documentation: The architecture of the Amazon ECR container image.

author.documentation: The image author of the Amazon ECR container image.

imageHash.documentation: The image hash of the Amazon ECR container image.

imageTags.documentation: The image tags attached to the Amazon ECR container image.

platform.documentation: The platform of the Amazon ECR container image.

pushedAt.documentation: The date and time the Amazon ECR container image was pushed.

registry.documentation: The registry the Amazon ECR container image belongs to.

repositoryName.documentation: The name of the repository the Amazon ECR container image resides in.

BadRequestException.documentation: One or more tags submitted as part of the request is not valid.

accountIds.documentation: The 12-digit Amazon Web Services account IDs of the accounts to retrieve Amazon Inspector status for.

accounts.documentation: An array of objects that provide details on the status of Amazon Inspector for each of the requested accounts.

failedAccounts.documentation: An array of objects detailing any accounts that failed to enable Amazon Inspector and why.

accountIds.documentation: The account IDs to get free trial status for.

accounts.documentation: An array of objects that provide Amazon Inspector free trial details for each of the requested accounts.

failedAccounts.documentation: An array of objects detailing any accounts that free trial data could not be returned for.

reportId.documentation: The ID of the report to be canceled.

Counts.documentation: a structure that contains information on the count of resources within a group.

CoverageFilterCriteria.documentation: A structure that identifies filter criteria for GetCoverageStatistics.

accountId.documentation: An array of Amazon Web Services account IDs to return coverage statistics for.

ec2InstanceTags.documentation: The Amazon EC2 instance tags to filter on.

ecrImageTags.documentation: The Amazon ECR image tags to filter on.

ecrRepositoryName.documentation: The Amazon ECR repository name to filter on.

resourceId.documentation: An array of Amazon Web Services resource IDs to return coverage statistics for.

resourceType.documentation: An array of Amazon Web Services resource types to return coverage statistics for. The values can be AWS_EC2_INSTANCE or AWS_ECR_REPOSITORY.

scanStatusCode.documentation: The scan status code to filter on.

scanStatusReason.documentation: The scan status reason to filter on.

scanType.documentation: An array of Amazon Inspector scan types to return coverage statistics for.

CoverageMapFilter.documentation: Contains details of a coverage map filter.

key.documentation: The tag key associated with the coverage map filter.

value.documentation: The tag value associated with the coverage map filter.

CoverageStringFilter.documentation: Contains details of a coverage string filter.

CoveredResource.documentation: An object that contains details about a resource covered by Amazon Inspector.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the covered resource.

resourceMetadata.documentation: An object that contains details about the metadata.

scanStatus.documentation: The status of the scan covering the resource.

scanType.documentation: The Amazon Inspector scan type covering the resource.

action.documentation: Defines the action that is to be applied to the findings that match the filter.

filterCriteria.documentation: Defines the criteria to be used in the filter for querying findings.

name.documentation: The name of the filter. Minimum length of 3. Maximum length of 64. Valid characters include alphanumeric characters, dot (.), underscore (_), and dash (-). Spaces are not allowed.

tags.documentation: A list of tags for the filter.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the successfully created filter.

filterCriteria.documentation: The filter criteria to apply to the results of the finding report.

reportFormat.documentation: The format to generate the report in.

s3Destination.documentation: The Amazon S3 export destination for the report.

baseScore.documentation: The base CVSS score used for the finding.

scoringVector.documentation: The vector string of the CVSS score.

version.documentation: The version of CVSS used for the score.

CvssScoreAdjustment.documentation: Details on adjustments Amazon Inspector made to the CVSS score for a finding.

metric.documentation: The metric used to adjust the CVSS score.

reason.documentation: The reason the CVSS score has been adjustment.

adjustments.documentation: An object that contains details about adjustment Amazon Inspector made to the CVSS score.

DateFilter.documentation: Contains details on the time range used to filter findings.

endInclusive.documentation: A timestamp representing the end of the time period filtered on.

startInclusive.documentation: A timestamp representing the start of the time period filtered on.

DelegatedAdmin.documentation: Details of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.

relationshipStatus.documentation: The status of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.

DelegatedAdminAccount.documentation: Details of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for your organization.

status.documentation: The status of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the filter to be deleted.
The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the filter that has been deleted.

autoEnable.documentation: The scan types are automatically enabled for new members of your organization.

maxAccountLimitReached.documentation: Represents whether your organization has reached the maximum Amazon Web Services account limit for Amazon Inspector.

Destination.documentation: Contains details of the Amazon S3 bucket and KMS key used to export findings.

bucketName.documentation: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to export findings to.

keyPrefix.documentation: The prefix of the KMS key used to export findings.

kmsKeyArn.documentation: The ARN of the KMS key used to encrypt data when exporting findings.

delegatedAdminAccountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the current Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.
The Amazon Web Services account ID of the successfully disabled delegated administrator.

accountIds.documentation: An array of account IDs you want to disable Amazon Inspector scans for.

resourceTypes.documentation: The resource scan types you want to disable.

accounts.documentation: Information on the accounts that have had Amazon Inspector scans successfully disabled. Details are provided for each account.

failedAccounts.documentation: Information on any accounts for which Amazon Inspector scans could not be disabled. Details are provided for each account.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the member account to disassociate.
The Amazon Web Services account ID of the successfully disassociated member.

Ec2InstanceAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on Amazon EC2 instances.

amis.documentation: The AMI IDs associated with the Amazon EC2 instances to aggregate findings for.

instanceIds.documentation: The Amazon EC2 instance IDs to aggregate findings for.

instanceTags.documentation: The Amazon EC2 instance tags to aggregate findings for.

operatingSystems.documentation: The operating system types to aggregate findings for. Valid values must be uppercase and underscore separated, examples are ORACLE_LINUX_7 and ALPINE_LINUX_3_8.

Ec2InstanceAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains the results of a finding aggregation by Amazon EC2 instance.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account the Amazon EC2 instance belongs to.

ami.documentation: The Amazon Machine Image (AMI) of the Amazon EC2 instance.

networkFindings.documentation: The number of network findings for the Amazon EC2 instance.

operatingSystem.documentation: The operating system of the Amazon EC2 instance.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that contains the count of matched findings per severity.

Ec2Metadata.documentation: Meta data details of an Amazon EC2 instance.

amiId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) used to launch the instance.

EcrConfiguration.documentation: Details about the ECR automated re-scan duration setting for your environment

rescanDuration.documentation: The ECR automated re-scan duration defines how long an ECR image will be actively scanned by Amazon Inspector. When the number of days since an image was last pushed exceeds the automated re-scan duration the monitoring state of that image becomes inactive and all associated findings are scheduled for closure.

EcrConfigurationState.documentation: Details about the state of the ECR scans for your environment.

rescanDurationState.documentation: An object that contains details about the state of the ECR automated re-scan setting.

EcrContainerImageMetadata.documentation: Information on the Amazon ECR image metadata associated with a finding.

tags.documentation: Tags associated with the Amazon ECR image metadata.

EcrRepositoryMetadata.documentation: Information on the Amazon ECR repository metadata associated with a finding.

name.documentation: The name of the Amazon ECR repository.

EcrRescanDurationState.documentation: Details about the state of any changes to the ECR automated re-scan duration setting.

rescanDuration.documentation: The ECR automated re-scan duration defines how long an ECR image will be actively scanned by Amazon Inspector. When the number of days since an image was last pushed exceeds the automated re-scan duration the monitoring state of that image becomes inactive and all associated findings are scheduled for closure.

status.documentation: The status of changes to the ECR automated re-scan duration.

updatedAt.documentation: A timestamp representing when the last time the ECR scan duration setting was changed.

delegatedAdminAccountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.
The Amazon Web Services account ID of the successfully Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.

accountIds.documentation: A list of account IDs you want to enable Amazon Inspector scans for.

resourceTypes.documentation: The resource scan types you want to enable.

accounts.documentation: Information on the accounts that have had Amazon Inspector scans successfully enabled. Details are provided for each account.

failedAccounts.documentation: Information on any accounts for which Amazon Inspector scans could not be enabled. Details are provided for each account.

FailedAccount.documentation: An object with details on why an account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

errorCode.documentation: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

resourceStatus.documentation: An object detailing which resources Amazon Inspector is enabled to scan for the account.

status.documentation: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

action.documentation: The action that is to be applied to the findings that match the filter.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) associated with this filter.

createdAt.documentation: The date and time this filter was created at.

criteria.documentation: Details on the filter criteria associated with this filter.

ownerId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account that created the filter.

updatedAt.documentation: The date and time the filter was last updated at.

FilterCriteria.documentation: Details on the criteria used to define the filter.

awsAccountId.documentation: Details of the Amazon Web Services account IDs used to filter findings.

componentId.documentation: Details of the component IDs used to filter findings.

componentType.documentation: Details of the component types used to filter findings.

ec2InstanceImageId.documentation: Details of the Amazon EC2 instance image IDs used to filter findings.

ec2InstanceSubnetId.documentation: Details of the Amazon EC2 instance subnet IDs used to filter findings.

ec2InstanceVpcId.documentation: Details of the Amazon EC2 instance VPC IDs used to filter findings.

ecrImageArchitecture.documentation: Details of the Amazon ECR image architecture types used to filter findings.

ecrImageHash.documentation: Details of the Amazon ECR image hashes used to filter findings.

ecrImagePushedAt.documentation: Details on the Amazon ECR image push date and time used to filter findings.

ecrImageRegistry.documentation: Details on the Amazon ECR registry used to filter findings.

ecrImageRepositoryName.documentation: Details on the name of the Amazon ECR repository used to filter findings.

ecrImageTags.documentation: The tags attached to the Amazon ECR container image.

findingArn.documentation: Details on the finding ARNs used to filter findings.

findingStatus.documentation: Details on the finding status types used to filter findings.

findingType.documentation: Details on the finding types used to filter findings.

firstObservedAt.documentation: Details on the date and time a finding was first seen used to filter findings.

fixAvailable.documentation: Details on whether a fix is available through a version update. This value can be YES, NO, or PARTIAL. A PARTIAL fix means that some, but not all, of the packages identified in the finding have fixes available through updated versions.

inspectorScore.documentation: The Amazon Inspector score to filter on.

lastObservedAt.documentation: Details on the date and time a finding was last seen used to filter findings.

networkProtocol.documentation: Details on the ingress source addresses used to filter findings.

portRange.documentation: Details on the port ranges used to filter findings.

relatedVulnerabilities.documentation: Details on the related vulnerabilities used to filter findings.

resourceId.documentation: Details on the resource IDs used to filter findings.

resourceTags.documentation: Details on the resource tags used to filter findings.

resourceType.documentation: Details on the resource types used to filter findings.

severity.documentation: Details on the severity used to filter findings.

title.documentation: Details on the finding title used to filter findings.

updatedAt.documentation: Details on the date and time a finding was last updated at used to filter findings.

vendorSeverity.documentation: Details on the vendor severity used to filter findings.

vulnerabilityId.documentation: Details on the vulnerability ID used to filter findings.

vulnerabilitySource.documentation: Details on the vulnerability type used to filter findings.

vulnerablePackages.documentation: Details on the vulnerable packages used to filter findings.

awsAccountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the finding.

findingArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the finding.

firstObservedAt.documentation: The date and time that the finding was first observed.

fixAvailable.documentation: Details on whether a fix is available through a version update. This value can be YES, NO, or PARTIAL. A PARTIAL fix means that some, but not all, of the packages identified in the finding have fixes available through updated versions.

inspectorScore.documentation: The Amazon Inspector score given to the finding.

inspectorScoreDetails.documentation: An object that contains details of the Amazon Inspector score.

lastObservedAt.documentation: The date and time that the finding was last observed.

networkReachabilityDetails.documentation: An object that contains the details of a network reachability finding.

packageVulnerabilityDetails.documentation: An object that contains the details of a package vulnerability finding.

remediation.documentation: An object that contains the details about how to remediate a finding.

resources.documentation: Contains information on the resources involved in a finding.

updatedAt.documentation: The date and time the finding was last updated at.

FindingTypeAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on finding type.

FindingTypeAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains the results of a finding type aggregation.

accountId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account associated with the findings.

FreeTrialAccountInfo.documentation: Information about the Amazon Inspector free trial for an account.

accountId.documentation: The account associated with the Amazon Inspector free trial information.

freeTrialInfo.documentation: Contains information about the Amazon Inspector free trial for an account.

FreeTrialInfo.documentation: An object that contains information about the Amazon Inspector free trial for an account.

end.documentation: The date and time that the Amazon Inspector free trail ends for a given account.

start.documentation: The date and time that the Amazon Inspector free trail started for a given account.

type.documentation: The type of scan covered by the Amazon Inspector free trail.

FreeTrialInfoError.documentation: Information about an error received while accessing free trail data for an account.

accountId.documentation: The account associated with the Amazon Inspector free trial information.

ecrConfiguration.documentation: Specifies how the ECR automated re-scan duration is currently configured for your environment.

delegatedAdmin.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator.

reportId.documentation: The ID of the report to retrieve the status of.

filterCriteria.documentation: The filter criteria associated with the report.

accountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the member account to retrieve information on.

resourceIds.documentation: The ID of the container image layer.

resourceId.documentation: The resource ID of the container image layer.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that represents the count of matched findings per severity.

InspectorScoreDetails.documentation: Information about the Amazon Inspector score given to a finding.

adjustedCvss.documentation: An object that contains details about the CVSS score given to a finding.

InternalServerException.documentation: The request has failed due to an internal failure of the Amazon Inspector service.

retryAfterSeconds.documentation: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

maxResults.documentation: The maximum number of results to return in the response.

nextToken.documentation: A token to use for paginating results that are returned in the response. Set the value of this parameter to null for the first request to a list action. For subsequent calls, use the NextToken value returned from the previous request to continue listing results after the first page.

service.documentation: The service scan type to check permissions for.

nextToken.documentation: A token to use for paginating results that are returned in the response. Set the value of this parameter to null for the first request to a list action. onlyAssociated.documentation: Specifies whether to list only currently associated members if True or to list all members within the organization if False.

members.documentation: An object that contains details for each member account.

nextToken.documentation: The pagination parameter to be used on the next list operation to retrieve more items.

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon resource number (ARN) of the resource to list tags of.

accountIds.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account IDs to retrieve usage totals for.

totals.documentation: An object with details on the total usage for the requested account.

MapFilter.documentation: An object that describes details of a map filter.

comparison.documentation: The operator to use when comparing values in the filter.

key.documentation: The tag key used in the filter.

value.documentation: The tag value used in the filter.

Member.documentation: Details on a member account in your organization.

delegatedAdminAccountId.documentation: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for this member account.

updatedAt.documentation: A timestamp showing when the status of this member was last updated.

NetworkPath.documentation: Information on the network path associated with a finding.

steps.documentation: The details on the steps in the network path.

openPortRange.documentation: An object that contains details about the open port range associated with a finding.

NumberFilter.documentation: An object that describes the details of a number filter.

lowerInclusive.documentation: The lowest number to be included in the filter.

upperInclusive.documentation: The highest number to be included in the filter.

PackageAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on operating system package type.

packageNames.documentation: The names of packages to aggregate findings on.

PackageAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains the results of a finding aggregation by image layer.

accountId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account associated with the findings.

packageName.documentation: The name of the operating system package.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that contains the count of matched findings per severity.

PackageFilter.documentation: Contains information on the details of a package filter.

architecture.documentation: An object that contains details on the package architecture type to filter on.

epoch.documentation: An object that contains details on the package epoch to filter on.

name.documentation: An object that contains details on the name of the package to filter on.

release.documentation: An object that contains details on the package release to filter on.

sourceLayerHash.documentation: An object that contains details on the source layer hash to filter on.

cvss.documentation: An object that contains details about the CVSS score of a finding.

referenceUrls.documentation: One or more URLs that contain details about this vulnerability type.

relatedVulnerabilities.documentation: One or more vulnerabilities related to the one identified in this finding.

sourceUrl.documentation: A URL to the source of the vulnerability information.

vendorCreatedAt.documentation: The date and time that this vulnerability was first added to the vendor's database.

vendorSeverity.documentation: The severity the vendor has given to this vulnerability type.

vendorUpdatedAt.documentation: The date and time the vendor last updated this vulnerability in their database.

Permission.documentation: Contains information on the permissions an account has within Amazon Inspector.

operation.documentation: The operations that can be performed with the given permissions.

service.documentation: The services that the permissions allow an account to perform the given operations for.

PortRange.documentation: Details about the port range associated with a finding.

begin.documentation: The beginning port in a port range.

end.documentation: The ending port in a port range.

PortRangeFilter.documentation: An object that describes the details of a port range filter.

beginInclusive.documentation: The port number the port range begins at.

endInclusive.documentation: The port number the port range ends at.

Recommendation.documentation: Details about the recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

Url.documentation: The URL address to the CVE remediation recommendations.

text.documentation: The recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

Remediation.documentation: Information on how to remediate a finding.

recommendation.documentation: An object that contains information about the recommended course of action to remediate the finding.

RepositoryAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on repository.

repositories.documentation: The names of repositories to aggregate findings on.

RepositoryAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains details on the results of a finding aggregation by repository.

accountId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account associated with the findings.

affectedImages.documentation: The number of container images impacted by the findings.

repository.documentation: The name of the repository associated with the findings.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that represent the count of matched findings per severity.

Resource.documentation: Details about the resource involved in a finding.

details.documentation: An object that contains details about the resource involved in a finding.

region.documentation: The Amazon Web Services Region the impacted resource is located in.

ResourceDetails.documentation: Contains details about the resource involved in the finding.

awsEc2Instance.documentation: An object that contains details about the Amazon EC2 instance involved in the finding.

awsEcrContainerImage.documentation: An object that contains details about the Amazon ECR container image involved in the finding.

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: The operation tried to access an invalid resource. Make sure the resource is specified correctly.

ResourceScanMetadata.documentation: An object that contains details about the metadata for an Amazon ECR resource.

ec2.documentation: An object that contains metadata details for an Amazon EC2 instance.

ecrImage.documentation: An object that contains details about the container metadata for an Amazon ECR image.

ecrRepository.documentation: An object that contains details about the repository an Amazon ECR image resides in.

ResourceState.documentation: Details the state of Amazon Inspector for each resource type Amazon Inspector scans.

ec2.documentation: An object detailing the state of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon EC2 resources.

ecr.documentation: An object detailing the state of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon ECR resources.

ResourceStatus.documentation: Details the status of Amazon Inspector for each resource type Amazon Inspector scans.

ec2.documentation: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon EC2 resources.

ecr.documentation: The status of Amazon Inspector scanning for Amazon ECR resources.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: You have exceeded your service quota. To perform the requested action, remove some of the relevant resources, or use Service Quotas to request a service quota increase.

resourceId.documentation: The ID of the resource that exceeds a service quota.

SeverityCounts.documentation: An object that contains the counts of aggregated finding per severity.

all.documentation: The total count of findings from all severities.

critical.documentation: The total count of critical severity findings.

high.documentation: The total count of high severity findings.

medium.documentation: The total count of medium severity findings.

SortCriteria.documentation: Details about the criteria used to sort finding results.

field.documentation: The finding detail field by which results are sorted.

sortOrder.documentation: The order by which findings are sorted.

State.documentation: An object that described the state of Amazon Inspector scans for an account.

errorCode.documentation: The error code explaining why the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

errorMessage.documentation: The error message received when the account failed to enable Amazon Inspector.

status.documentation: The status of Amazon Inspector for the account.

Step.documentation: Details about the step associated with a finding.

StringFilter.documentation: An object that describes the details of a string filter.

comparison.documentation: The operator to use when comparing values in the filter

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to apply a tag to.

tags.documentation: The tags to be added to a resource.

ThrottlingException.documentation: The limit on the number of requests per second was exceeded.

TitleAggregation.documentation: The details that define an aggregation based on finding title.

TitleAggregationResponse.documentation: A response that contains details on the results of a finding aggregation by title.

accountId.documentation: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account associated with the findings.

severityCounts.documentation: An object that represent the count of matched findings per severity.

title.documentation: The title that the findings were aggregated on.

resourceArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resource to remove tags from.

tagKeys.documentation: The tag keys to remove from the resource.

ecrConfiguration.documentation: Specifies how the ECR automated re-scan will be updated for your environment.

action.documentation: Specifies the action that is to be applied to the findings that match the filter.

filterArn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the filter to update.

filterCriteria.documentation: Defines the criteria to be update in the filter.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the successfully updated filter.

autoEnable.documentation: Defines which scan types are enabled automatically for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.
The updated status of scan types automatically enabled for new members of your Amazon Inspector organization.

Usage.documentation: Contains usage information about the cost of Amazon Inspector operation.

currency.documentation: The currency type used when calculating usage data.

estimatedMonthlyCost.documentation: The estimated monthly cost of Amazon Inspector.

UsageTotal.documentation: The total of usage for an account ID.

accountId.documentation: The account ID of the account that usage data was retrieved for.

usage.documentation: An object representing the total usage for an account.

ValidationException.documentation: The request has failed validation due to missing required fields or having invalid inputs.

ValidationExceptionField.documentation: An object that describes a validation exception.

VulnerablePackage.documentation: Information on the vulnerable package identified by a finding.

filePath.documentation: The file path of the vulnerable package.

fixedInVersion.documentation: The version of the package that contains the vulnerability fix.

packageManager.documentation: The package manager of the vulnerable package.

remediation.documentation: The code to run in your environment to update packages with a fix available.

sourceLayerHash.documentation: The source layer hash of the vulnerable package.
